name: #1 "Transferência" [Live🔴] performance (Lucas-PC-GAMER_+_DjDani3DS)
description:
#1 Transferência.
Length: 00:56:14
Bitrate: 112KBs

Recording of the improvised performance (Transferência) at the opening of the exhibition "Um pouco de sonho e o resto do óbvio, / A little of dream and the residual obvious," at Galeria Refresco, located in Santo Cristo neighborhood in the city of Rio de Janeiro.

Sound performers of Transferência: 
Daniela Avellar (instagram.com/daniela_avellar)
and 701Lucas (@lucas414141_9)

Floor access is from Fujioka.
(instagram.com/fujiok1331odafg)

The audio was recorded by Julio Sta Cecilia.
(instagram.com/juliostacecilia) 
@sugarmorphoses4


Equipments:
1.Cassette tapes; 
2.Computer; 
3.Nintendo 3DS.
